general.welcome: Welcome! Your account information is listed below.
general.noPermission: You don't have permission to use this command!
general.cooldown: You need to wait {time} seconds to use this command again!

premium.notPremium: You need to be a Premium member to use this feature!
premium.notUltraPremium: You need to be an UltraPremium member to use this feature!
premium.alreadyPremium: You are already a Premium member!
premium.alreadyUltraPremium: You are already an UltraPremium member!
premium.invalidType: ❌ Invalid premium type! Please use 'premium' or 'ultraPremium'.
premium.invalidDuration: ❌ Invalid duration! Duration must be between {min} and {max} days.
premium.alreadyPremium: ❌ You already have an active Premium membership!
premium.alreadyUltraPremium: ❌ You already have an active Ultra Premium membership!
premium.activationInfo:
Your {type} membership has been activated for {duration} days.
End date: {endDate}
premium.thankYou: Thank you for your premium membership!
premium.activationHelp: You can use the following commands to activate premium membership:
premium.noData: ❌ You don't have any premium membership data yet.
premium.checkFooter: You can use 't!premium check' to check your premium status.

premium.title: 💎 Premium Features
premium.description: Features you'll get with premium membership:
premium.footer: Use t!premium activate command for premium membership

help.title: 📘 Command Help Menu
help.description: Below is a list of all available commands.

account.name: 🎉 t!account
account.description: Detailed information about your account (Premium status, statistics, features)

active.name: 🤖 t!active
active.description: Shows the number of active bots

dm.name: 📩 t!dm
dm.description: Sends spam messages to the specified user

zdm.name: 🎯 t!zdm
zdm.description: Sends custom spam messages to the specified user

premium.name: 💎 t!pre
premium.description: Shows premium membership benefits and prices

membership.name: 🎫 t!membership
membership.description: Gives premium membership to a user (Moderators only)

help.note: 💡 Note: Premium memberships are charged daily and can be given for up to 30 days.

account.title: 👤 Account Information
account.description: All information about your account is listed below.
account.footer: 💎 Use t!pre command for premium membership

ultraPremium.title: 🌟 UltraPremium Features
ultraPremium.description: Features you'll get with UltraPremium membership:
ultraPremium.footer: Use t!premium activate command for UltraPremium membership

zdm.invalidCount: Message count must be a number!

membership.title: 🎫 Membership Management
membership.usage: You can use the following commands to give premium membership to a user:
membership.footer: Only moderators can use this command.
